It can't be helped but there is a gloomy feeling around, maybe it's just the nostalgia of people moving in and out of the store of times past that seems to be missing now, or maybe is just the lack of illumination, after all the lights and signs are off.

You realise that in fact this can be a good place for living, people can have anything they need and the surroundings are good enough, they have the river close by and the central station too. With the proper planning this housing project can become a place for people to be happy, even if they have to live above a supermarket.
